patthana10.17:5.1: Hetuyā tiṃsa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … aññamaññe pañcavīsa … pe … avigate tiṃsa.
patthana10.17:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:6.2: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:6.3: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … cha.
patthana10.17:7.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:7.2: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … cha.
patthana10.17:8.1: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana10.17:9.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasaraṇañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ nasaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana10.17:10.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana10.17:11.1: Hetuyā tiṃsa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … aññamaññe pañcavīsa … pe … avigate tiṃsa.
patthana10.17:12.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:12.2: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:12.3: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana10.17:13.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:13.2: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:13.3: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana10.17:14.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:14.2: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:14.3: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:15.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana10.17:15.4: (Sahajātavārepi paccayavārepi nissayavārepi saṃsaṭṭhavārepi sampayuttavārepi sabbattha nava.)
